# The `IndexedReference` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represents a memory reference as a base pointer and a set of indexing operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::IndexedReference</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represents a memory reference as a base pointer and a set of indexing operations.

For example given the array reference A&#91;i&#93;&#91;2j+1&#93;&#91;3k+2&#93; in a 3-dim loop nest: for(i=0;i&lt;n;++i) for(j=0;j&lt;m;++j) for(k=0;k&lt;o;++k) ... A&#91;i&#93;&#91;2j+1&#93;&#91;3k+2&#93; ... We expect: BasePointer -&gt; A Subscripts -&gt; &#91;&#123;0,+,1&#125;&lt;for.i&gt;&#93;&#91;&#123;1,+,2&#125;&lt;for.j&gt;&#93;&#91;&#123;2,+,3&#125;&lt;for.k&gt;&#93; Sizes -&gt; &#91;m&#93;&#91;o&#93;&#91;4&#93;

Definition at line 49 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### computeRefCost() {#a0182cdf55f9bfbdd904e3f5e6802316a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CacheCostTy IndexedReference::computeRefCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, unsigned CLS) const</>}>
Compute the cost of the reference w.r.t.

the given loop <code>L</code> when it is considered in the innermost position in the loop nest. The cost is defined as:
<ul>
<li>equal to one if the reference is loop invariant, or</li>
<li>equal to &#39;(TripCount &#42; stride) / cache&#95;line&#95;size&#39; if:
<ul>
<li>the reference stride is less than the cache line size, and</li>
<li>the coefficient of this loop&#39;s index variable used in all other subscripts is zero</li>
</ul></li>
<li>or otherwise equal to &#39;TripCount&#39;.</li>
</ul>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp/#l00272">272</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasSpacialReuse() {#a68b97d806d8c2e58e42e7038bc6d45b8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; bool &gt; IndexedReference::hasSpacialReuse (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference">IndexedReference</a> &amp; Other, unsigned CLS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp; AA) const</>}>
Return true/false if the current object and the indexed reference <code>Other</code> are/aren&#39;t in the same cache line of size <code>CLS</code>.

Two references are in the same chace line iff the distance between them in the innermost dimension is less than the cache line size. Return std::nullopt if unsure.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hasTemporalReuse() {#a6b2b20549af64712df253586da3701a8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; bool &gt; IndexedReference::hasTemporalReuse (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference">IndexedReference</a> &amp; Other, unsigned MaxDistance, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp; DI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp; AA) const</>}>
Return true if the current object and the indexed reference <code>Other</code> have distance smaller than <code>MaxDistance</code> in the dimension associated with the given loop <code>L</code>.

Return false if the distance is not smaller than <code>MaxDistance</code> and std::nullopt if unsure.

### getSubscriptIndex() {#ac23a43b26bc8012ac37d141778544e17}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int IndexedReference::getSubscriptIndex (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L) const</>}>
Retrieve the index of the subscript corresponding to the given loop <code>L</code>.

Return a zero-based positive index if the subscript index is succesfully located and a negative value otherwise. For example given the indexed reference &#39;A&#91;i&#93;&#91;2j+1&#93;&#91;3k+2&#93;&#39;, the call &#39;getSubscriptIndex(loop-k)&#39; would return value 2.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h/#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp/#l00507">507</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isConsecutive() {#acdbd415a6f330e2622c8016bd1b4dd91}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IndexedReference::isConsecutive (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;&amp; Stride, unsigned CLS) const</>}>
Return true if the indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39; in loop <code>L</code>.

An indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39; if the only coefficient that uses the loop induction variable is the rightmost one, and the access stride is smaller than the cache line size <code>CLS</code>. Provide a valid <code>Stride</code> value if the indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-h">LoopCacheAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp/#l00473">473</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
